name: Myte Byte
description:
Myte Byte is a small action-puzzle game made for real Gameboy hardware that will challenge any gamer's puzzle solving skills.

This game features 35 levels meant to test your reflexes, options in the  menu to adjust the game setting difficulty (for the journalists), 8 bosses to rumble toe to toe with as well as secret files to recover from the evil bosses.  The color pallet is optimized for a balance between GBC/GBA.

It' important to note that you cannot save in game as this is a GBC title without a save battery.  There is also no save function on the original DMG Gameboy system due to the limitations. *

This game has been a year long adventure that I hope you enjoy.   It was developed entirely by me in my spare time with only minor assistance in quality control. Otherwise this has been drawn, composed, built and planned all by me for your gaming pleasure. Enjoy!

-Sincerely, Developer-0
